[~ if ( r.recognition && r.recognition.length ) { ~]
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
%	SECTION TITLE
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\cvsection{Honors \& Awards}


%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
%	SUBSECTION TITLE
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\cvsubsection{International}


%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
%	CONTENT
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{cvhonors}
[~ _.each( r.recognition, function(rgn) { ~]
%---------------------------------------------------------
  \cvhonor
    {[[ rgn.title ]]} % Award
    {[[ rgn.from ]]} % Event
    {[[ rgn.location ]]} % Location
    {[[ h.date(rgn.date) ]]} % Date(s)

[~ }); ~]
%---------------------------------------------------------
\end{cvhonors}


%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
%	SUBSECTION TITLE
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\cvsubsection{Domestic}


%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
%	CONTENT
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{cvhonors}
[~ _.each( r.recognition, function(rgn) { ~]
%---------------------------------------------------------
  \cvhonor
  {[[ rgn.title ]]} % Award
  {[[ rgn.from ]]} % Event
  {[[ rgn.location ]]} % Location
  {[[ h.date(rgn.date) ]]} % Date(s)

[~ }); ~]
%---------------------------------------------------------
\end{cvhonors}
[~ } ~]
